item.title: Diagnosing Representation Dynamics in NER Model Extension
item.description: arXiv:2510.17930v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Extending Named Entity Recognition (NER) models to new PII entities in noisy spoken-language data is a common need. We find that jointly fine-tuning a BERT model on standard semantic entities (PER, LOC, ORG) and new pattern-based PII (EMAIL, PHONE) re...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> tool, fine-tuning, release, arxiv, model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 80%</small>
